thread.title: Alia Bhatt to dance, Rajinikanth in the audience at the ISL opening today
thread.title_full: Alia Bhatt to dance, Rajinikanth in the audience at the ISL opening today - The Times of India

author: Ashish Joseph
title: Alia Bhatt to dance, Rajinikanth in the audience at the ISL opening today
text:
I was earlier reported that Bollywood actress Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and composer AR Rahman will be performing at the opening ceremony of the Indian Super League today in Chennai. Now, we've learnt that the Student Of The Year actress, Alia Bhatt, will also join the star performers of the evening, and shake a leg.
"Alia has agreed to perform and will be doing a dance number," says a source close to the developments, adding, "Rajinikanth has accepted the invitation and will be attending the ceremony along with other celebs."
